The log entry appears for any file subsystem property page. So while the inability to create this particular page is a problem, the log entry may not reveal the cause.

For I20070404-1200, I fixed displaying the Launcher Property Pages (bug 180933). But the actual log that you see may come from something different.

I know that the Platform also had a couple of these logs e.g. bug 90091 or bug 178868 or bug 179589. Uwe - you dealt with Commands and Expressions recently, do you have an idea?

Perhaps Eclipse 3.3 requires us to register something that we currently do not register.
Actually, my bugfix may fix the error log as well. Dave can you retest with I20070404-1200?
Saw the error logged with I20070404-1200 as well.
It seems that CDT fixed a similar issue in bug 180286

I cannot reproduce the issue without CDT installed, so I assume that this is actually the CDT bug. 

Marking as duplicate. Dave could you try to apply the patch from bug 180286, i.e. download the plugin.xml file from there and place it into your org.eclipse.cdt.managedbuilder.ui/plugin.xml -- this should fix the issue.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 180286 ***

Final fix for this problem was put to CVS just now.
So, only the latest CDT is free of this bug.
If it's impossible to obtain CDT from head, we
need to edit org.eclipse.cdt.ui/plugin.xml file:

  type="org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable"/>
  
and replace it with

  type="java.lang.Object"/>
